name: pongo
description: Pong game with Rust + WebGPU + Cloudflare Durable Objects

scripts.test:all: prettier --check . && cargo fmt --check && cargo check --workspace && cargo clippy --workspace -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace
scripts.build:server: cd lobby_worker && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../worker/pkg && cp index.html style.css script.js ../worker/pkg/
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
